about_the_game:
Jim Guthrie, Canadian Indie rock stalwart and composer of beloved soundtracks Superbrothers: Sword & Sworcery EP, Indie Game The Movie, and Reigns: Her Majesty takes listeners even deeper with BELOW.

BELOW'S expansive original soundtrack blends Guthrie's distinct acoustic melodies with moody atmospherics, sparkling synth soundscapes, haunting drones and driving rhythms--bringing alive the mystery of BELOW in an epic journey for listeners.
